alerts.selectNumberField: Retrieve views, comments, and other data based on Bilibili video links
alerts.selectGroupFieldTip: The plugin can automatically create selected fields. If mapping is needed, ensure that the field names in the multidimensional table match the option names. It is recommended that the 'Uploader' field is text, 'xx Count' fields are numerical, and 'Release Time' is a date.

checks.number: Type Check Failed: Type is not a number
checks.text: Type Check Failed: Type is not text
checks.datetime: Type Check Failed: Type is not a date
checks.attachment: Type Check Failed: Type is not an attachment

placeholder.link: Please select the field column corresponding to the video link
